original_title: Pope Benedict XVI: A Love Affair with the Truth
overview: Delve into the history of Pope Benedict XVI, from his childhood in Bavaria to his service as a priest, bishop and cardinal. In addition to highlighting Pope Benedict's successes, this documentary examines his relationship with Pope John Paul II. Blessed with incredible intelligence and a compassionate heart, Pope Benedict XVI has worked hard to defend traditional Catholic values around the world.
title: Pope Benedict XVI: A Love Affair with the Truth
